channel.title: Lol [REQ] aggressive npc's with a twist (maybe TuT if i fix it anytime soon)
channel.description:
Is there any possible way to have two npc's attack each other to create a fight scene somewhat like the gnome / khazard fight from rs. Also, the same npcs'w WON'T attack the other npc's around the world. well they shouldn't if they are aggressive only to each other. where there not close anywhere else in the world. -_- :confused: i've been trying to do this for a few days :|
edit: i'm blazed and am trying to make sense :(
edit: maybe not even actually attack each other maybe give them an attack animation, not be able to walk.
